item.description:
Our post holiday "Holiday Party"!

Hope everyone can come. Please bring a snack or two or even one of your favorite dishes. Also, anyone who wants to participate in a print swap, please bring an image wrapped and matted. We'll be doing a drawing of the images later in the evening.

You are also welcome to bring a friend or significant other.

Hope to see you all there!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography January Meetup
